name: The Block Pro
title: The Block Researchs Analysts 2025 Predictions
text:
Synopsis
The crypto market in Q1 2025 is expected to face challenges with inflated expectations around monetary policy and regulation, while blockchain gaming and Layer 1 protocols continue to evolve with a focus on user experience and scalability.

Key Insights
- Bitcoin price is predicted to trade in line with broader macro assets in Q1 2025
- Fundraising and venture deployment are expected to remain active despite market challenges
- Ronin blockchain has emerged as a standout in the gaming sector, ranking 4th in active addresses and transaction count
- Layer 1 blockchains prioritizing scalability, low fees, and user experience are capturing market share
- NFTs and GameFi continue to experience a market downturn with declining sales volume, transaction counts, and average floor prices
- The European Union is developing unified crypto regulation through the MiCA framework
